title: 求个Forge
author: 一块钱
txt_content:
要1.7.2-Forge10.12.2.1128的文件
因为有个mod要用到，

replies.author: Exsu
replies.txt_content:
一块钱 发表于 2014-9-19 12:45
我不是正版，不能安装...
- -你选路径啊，点击 ...这个按钮，找到你要安装的客户端的.minecraft文件夹然后确定

replies.author: 一块钱
replies.txt_content:
there is no minecraft launcher profile at this location，you  need to run launcher first
我选完路径就这样
